definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)

sentences.english: It was butane vapor, leaking from a corroded steel pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 那是從腐蝕的鋼製石油管道中泄露的丁烷蒸汽。

sentences.english: The heat source for evaporation may be Iow pressure steam or surplus heat steam.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發操作的熱源可採用低壓蒸汽或廢熱蒸汽。

sentences.english: The heat source for evaporation may be Iow pressure steam or surplus heat steam.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發操作的熱源可採用低壓蒸汽或廢熱蒸汽。

sentences.english: Vapor starts to form, because it wants to be in the coexistence line.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽開始形成，因爲體系要處於共存狀態。

sentences.english: The water ran steaming into the tub.
He was scalded by the steam from the kettle.
sentences.chinese: 他被水壺裏的蒸汽燙傷了。

sentences.english: So desert should take heat with cereus.
sentences.chinese: 水加熱則成爲蒸汽，冷卻則成爲冰。

sentences.english: Early tugboats had steam engines; today diesel engines are used.
sentences.chinese: 早在拖船曾用蒸汽火車頭，今天柴油發動機使用。

sentences.english: Are air conditioning intakes which may permit the entry of cargo vapours closed?
sentences.chinese: 有可能吸入貨物蒸汽的空調系統進氣口是否已關閉？

sentences.english: It is feasible that both exhaustion and wetting by steam fog are carried out in the chamber with low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 低氣壓室中既抽真空又用蒸汽霧溼潤是可行的。

sentences.english: The constable in town has a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 鎮裏的治安官有一臺蒸汽機。

sentences.english: The bare wire was protection by steam, so prevent copper bare wire oxidation.
sentences.chinese: 裸線由蒸汽保護，以阻止裸銅線被氧化。

sentences.english: From outside came the sounds of hissing steam and squeaking metal.
sentences.chinese: 從外面而來的蒸汽的嘶嘶聲以及金屬的嘎吱聲。

sentences.english: The first steamboat to reach the city, in 1812, was appropriately called the New Orleans.
sentences.chinese: 第一艘蒸汽船於1812年抵達叫新奧爾良的城市。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the cause of failure of bacteria-killing by autoclave.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析高壓蒸汽滅菌失敗原因。

sentences.english: The high temperatures inherent in steam humidification make it virtually a sterile medium.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽加溼所固有的高溫，使蒸汽實際上成了殺菌介質。

definition: (of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
